name: Trandum Awakening
description:
Trandum Awakening ocur months after the events of Trandum.

Fia and Titan has been searching in the Gutlak Desert for more information about the Trandum, finally some unknown traveler adviced Fia to travel to the Devil's island, north of its current location...

Your objective is to awaken the Tradum by collecting enough metal in the island, you also will need to eat in order to survive.

Controls:

Change tool:

  • Mouse wheel, 1 and 2 keys or left and right arrows

Use tool:

  • Left Click to use the selected tool

Drive Titan:

  • Interact with Titan (Pressing E) and interact again to stop driving

Farming:

  1. Use titan laser (Left click) to prepare the soil
  2. Interact the prepared soil with Fia to plant the seeds (E Key)
  3. Water the plants when the soil dries using the Water Can

Fishing:

  1. Use the Fishing Rod in a fishing spot (Marked with an orange fish)
  2. Left Click when the color circle is the biggest possible without leaving the frame
  3. In Titan's turn click the fish to collect them

Mining:

  1. Use Titan's laser to break the shield of the mine
  2. Use Fia and her pickaxe to mine the ore

Combat:

  1. At night, some creatures will appear to destroy the Trandum Crystal
  2. Use Fia's Sword to throw them away
  3. Kill all of them to finish the day

You can die by starving if you don't have at least 10 pieces of farming food at the end of the day.

When you die the day repeats,

This is a prototype, the game is not in a finish state and it contains bugs.

I  didn't have time to add the lore, so I'm thinking of making it in comics.
